name: Astronaut Man's Adventure
description:
Very early in development

A 3d platformer adventure game. 

Play as Astronaut Man: Explore planets by running, jumping, crouching, swimming, sliding, diving, climbing, flying and shooting (not yet), and also solve puzzles (not yet) and help out crazy aliens (not yet) and stop the evil force (not yet). 

Any donations are highly appreciated, they help Astronaut Man buying fuel so he can visit more planets! 

-------------- FEATURES  --------------

  • Explore levels with a decent amount of moves
  • Collect magic eggs
  • Jump on ivy to automatically climb
  • Wall jumps
  • Different sounds for different grounds
  • ...expect more in future updates 

------------- CONTROLS ---------------------------

Gamepad:  The usual stuff, the right trigger controls camera, the left the guy. There is a SPEED button, on my gamepad it was "X".  When pressed, the character moves FAST 

Keyboard: 

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • mouse move for camera adjustments
  • SPACE to jump
  • X to dive
  • Shift to strafe
  • V to crouch
